mapper.sql: id, res_code, parent_id, app_name, menu_name, disabled, ismenu, menu_type, menu_url, orderby, description, add_time, add_user, update_time, update_user
mapper.select:
select
from t_resource where disabled = 1 ORDER BY orderby, id

mapper.update: update t_resource set res_code = #{resCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ismenu = #{ismenu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderby = #{orderby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_user = #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
